name: DUCK CASINO: BULLET
description: DUCK CASINO is a passionate unlimited duck shooting game integrating various weapons upgrading, magically refitted heavy machine guns and various playing methods.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or later Processor: Intel Core dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce G210 or 512mb video card memory DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 600 MB available space Additional Notes: This game supports 4K, but for the best gaming experience, screen should no smaller than 1920×1080, no higher than 3840×2160
recommended_requirements: Processor: Intel Core four core i5 i7 Graphics: 1GB video card memory
